dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Ferocious Acidic Crust​</line-height>
dataList.desc: When the head is broken, the part has -2 Skill Final Power

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Stolen Rupturing Shell​</line-height>
dataList.desc: When the shell is broken, the part has -2 Skill Final Power

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Emergency Nutrient Supply​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
After this unit defeats its ally, heal by 5% of Max HP.
At the end of the turn, if this unit has healed 15% of Max HP with the above effect, restore the shell.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>A Crab-eat-crab World​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
At less than 70% HP, Brutal Pummelling, Powerful! Pummel, and Foaming skills target another ally with the least current HP.
When attacking an ally, heals HP by the damage dealt.
When defeating an ally, heals HP by double the damage dealt.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Looming Presence​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Turn Start: All enemies lose 10 SP
